title: SceneMediaSourceConfig
description: The source of a media object. An instance of a scene media source.

format.title: Format
format.description:
The format of the media: equi is for an equirectangular resource (the most common one) and cube is for a cubemap resource (less common but more efficient to display). Can be :
  • equi
  • cube
  • flat
  • hotspot

streaming.title: Streaming
streaming.description:
The streaming method: either a html5 video (usually .mp4 or .webm), or a dash flux (.mpd). The authorized values are :
  • html5
  • dash

url.title: URL
url.description: This property is only set when the media is an image. The file can be local or on a distant server, but must be a valid image format.

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description:
The pattern to respect in case of a multi tiles media. Four parameters are authorized:
  • {face} is for the face, in case of a cubemap media
  • {level} is for the level of quality of the tile, in case of a multi resolution media
  • {x} if for the x coordinates of the tile
  • {y} if for the y coordinates of the tile

levels.title: Levels
levels.description: This property is only set when the media is a video. The files can be local or on a distant server, but must be a valid video format. If the array is composed of multiple URLs, it is considered that there are multiple qualities to consider. Each member is an instance of a scene source level.

order.title: Order
order.description:
Order of the layout in the cubemap media, ie where are the faces in the media, starting from the top left of the media. Needs to be a 6-char string, constitued with all of the following letter:
  • R for Right
  • L for Left
  • U for Up
  • D for Down
  • B for Back
  • F for Front

tile.title: Tile
tile.description: The size of a tile, in case the chosen format is cube. The size corresponds to the width and the height of a face.
